seo.seoDescription: We design, build and deploy websites that sell and help you grow your business worldwide.

hero.title: Great websites</br> for great entrepreneurs
hero.subtitle: We design, build and deploy websites that sell and help you grow your business worldwide.

services.groupDescription: We are Shopify partners that help ambitious entrepreneurs to sell more using Shopify. We can help you create a brand new site, boost your e-commerce performances and user experience, develop custom integrations with your supply chain and improve your workflow.

serviceList.title: Setup
serviceList.description: We will help you launch your online business or seamlessly migrate your shop from another platform and provide support for installing apps that simplify your work.

serviceList.title: Themes
serviceList.description: We will tweak an existing template or craft a new design from scratch to create your beautiful online store.

serviceList.title: Shopify Apps
serviceList.description: We build custom Shopify Apps to improve your workflow and to integrate your store with third parties.

services.groupDescription: We have in-house the expertise to design and build web platforms and mobile native experiences. Whether you have an idea, or you need a custom software we can make it happen.

serviceList.title: Mobile App
serviceList.description: We design and build cross platform mobile apps to offer unique native experiences.

serviceList.title: Web App
serviceList.description: Thanks to our expertise in full-stack web development we create custom platform using modern technologies. Whether you need to build a custom ERP or your startup idea we got you covered.

projects.title: Some of our clients..
projects.description: Abbiamo riportato qui alcuni case studies del progetti dai noi sviluppati, se hai bisogno di sapere altri nostri progetti e vuoi conoscere meglio inkOfPixel non esitare a scriverci
